profile.title: About
profile.description: Junior Backend Developer specialized in Laravel, with strong interest in API design, code structuring and comprehensive understanding of web systems. Comfortable with both backend and frontend, I have solid technical foundations and ability to quickly level up according to project needs.
profile.highlight: Junior profile with rigorous approach, focused on best practices, code readability and continuous improvement. Experienced in working on concrete projects and learning new technologies autonomously.
